page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {REDDITCH}IS A NEW TOWN,THERE HAS BEEN A LARGE INCREASE IN THE POPULATION IN THE LAST 15 YEARS.THERE HAS ALSO BEEN AN INCREASE IN THE NUMBER OF EMPLOYERS, THERE ARE SEVERAL DIFFERENT TYPES OF EMPLOYMENT IN REDDITCH.SINCE REDDITCH IS FAIRLY CENTRAL TO THE COUNTRY A NUMBER OF FIRMS ARE DISTRIBUTERS.MANUFACTURING INDUSTRY IS WELL REPRESENTED,THERE ARE A NUMBER OF FIRMS ENGAGED IN METAL MANUFACTURING.THE UNEMPLOYMENT RATE IN REDDITCH IS SLIGHTLY HIGHER THAN THE NATIONAL AVERAGE.THE LARGEST EMPLOYER IN OUR AREA IS "HIGH DUTY ALLOYS" THIS COMPANY HAS A METAL FORGE, THE GOODS MANUFACTURED ARE USED IN OTHER INDUSTRIES,NOTABLY THE CAR INDUSTRY,AIRCRAFT MANUFACTURE,AND NUCLEAR ENERGY.
